3: Liv, where do we walk next?
We've returned to somewhere near the ruins when we first engaged with the Corrupted. Now we'll just have to follow Kamui's signal through the excavated paths.
Looks like the Corrupted that attacked us left already.
How can you leave Nanami out of this! Nanami helped you out sooo much last time!
You ungrateful, heartless people! What color is your blood?! Nanami's so hurt she's gonna cry now! Any second!
Bianca's completely unbothered by Nanami, she really knows how to handle her...
Just keep calm and walk at your own pace.
Oh wow, withering obasans and the blossoming youth don't mix! Nanami can't handle it, her vitality is dying!
Nanami too... She's keeping her own pace as well.
No, not really. She appeared out of nowhere on a mission of ours and disrupted us a few times.
Hm? Hmm? Hmmmm? Wait, what did Nanami hear? Nanami's floating around in ecstasy—No, don't stop me!
Y-you are all worrying about Nanami! And even said you would give Nanami a good time by letting her join in your mission!
Nanami is so touched she's fully revived now! Nanami will definitely help you!
Nobody said anything remotely resembling that.
Let's go let's go! Time's ticking! If you need to find a missing person, Nanami's your detective—
